      Places inside Sydney Opera House

      • Opera Bar

        Cocktail · $$$

        2 Macquarie St. (Lower Concourse Level, Sydney Opera House)

        9.1

        "If stamina allows after the evening show at the Opera House, the Opera Bar is your best choice for a gourmet night cap, with its astounding views on the harbour. A special end, for a Perfect Day."

        InterContinental Hotels & Resorts

      • Sydney Opera House - Playhouse

        Theater

        2 Macquarie St

        9.3

        "Amazing place, beautiful architecture, great plays and musicals going on all the time. Go see one, VERY GOOD!!"

        Brad Hager

      • Sydney Opera House - Concert Hall

        Concert Hall

        2 Macquarie St.

        9.1

        "Always a great place to see acts perform."

        Jarrod Miller

        49 Market St. (at George St.)

        9.3

        5.7

      • Enmore Theatre

        Concert Hall

        118-132 Enmore Rd. (Btw Reiby & Simmons)

        8.1

        "Fantastic intimate concert venue, sitting or standing. One of the best in Australia!"

        Zachary P

      Places people like to go after Sydney Opera House

      • Royal Botanic Garden

        Botanical Garden

        Macquarie St (Cahill Express Way)

        9.4

        "Huge, beautiful garden with over 40 thousand types of plants and trees. I recommend using the little train inside the park as it is very very big plus the train driver doubles as a guide of the park."

        Merve O'Keefe

      • Circular Quay

        Neighborhood

        "Central to the Harbour Bridge and Opera House, Circular Quay has lots of restaurants and bars for you to spend your lazy afternoon with friends basking in the evening sun with spectacular views."

        Danijel Ô£ø James
